name: Tantei Jinguji Saburo: Early Collection
description:
Early Collection is a PlayStation compilation release that includes four early games from Tantei Jinguji series from Family Computer (a.k.a. Nintendo Entertainment System) era. In addition to four full games, the game features new opening video and with plenty of other extras accessible via main menu.

Games included in this release:
  • Tantei Jing?ji Sabur?: Shinjuku Ch?? K?en Satsujin Jiken (1987)
  • Tantei Jing?ji Sabur?: Yokohama-k? Renzoku Satsujin Jiken (1988)
  • Tantei Jing?ji Sabur?: Kiken na Futari (1988 (pt.1) / 1989 (pt.2))
  • Tantei Jing?ji Sabur?: Toki no Sugiyuku Mama ni (1990)
There is also a file report containing info on characters from all four games that gets filled as player plays through the games and meets new characters.

Extras included in this release:
  • Topics from Junguuji world: list of character and other info made as a matching mini-game
  • Art gallery: features three separate galleries, the past one with art from four NES titles, present one with PSX title art, and other featuring unused art
  • Sound gallery: featuring classic gallery with original NES tracks, modern gallery with PSX title tracks, and remix gallery with remixed tracks
  • Videos: opening videos from two Jinguuji PSX titles, Mikan no Report and Yume no Owari ni
alsoFor: PlayStation 3, PSP, PS Vita | Combined View
